import React,{useState}from'react';import axios from'axios';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const PersonaForm=_ref=>{let{onSubmit}=_ref;const[persona,setPersona]=useState({model:'',age:'',skinColor:'',personalityTrait:'',voiceType:''});const handleChange=e=>{const{name,value}=e.target;setPersona(prevState=>({...prevState,[name]:value}));};const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();const description=`${persona.model} ${persona.age} ${persona.skinColor} ${persona.personalityTrait} ${persona.voiceType}`;// when voicetype male- send male in api body and vice versa 
try{await axios.post('http://localhost:5001/save-persona',{...persona,description});onSubmit({...persona,description});}catch(error){console.error('Failed to save persona:',error);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",name:"model",value:persona.name,onChange:handleChange,placeholder:"Eg: Teen Girl, Young Man"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",name:"age",value:persona.age,onChange:handleChange,placeholder:"Age of Model"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",name:"skinColor",value:persona.skinColor,onChange:handleChange,placeholder:"Skin Color"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",name:"personalityTrait",value:persona.personalityTrait,onChange:handleChange,placeholder:"Personality Trait"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",name:"voiceType",value:persona.voiceType,onChange:handleChange,placeholder:"Voice Type"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Save Persona"})]});};export default PersonaForm;
